QuestData.Title: Fighting Fire With ... Anything
QuestData.Description: The inferno raging up ahead marks the front line between us and the forces of the Fire Lord. The fire elementals unleashed here are unlike any I've ever encountered.$B$BCan you help us stem the tide of destruction? Slay the raging firestorms... before they engulf Aessina's Grove and erase all hope of someday reclaiming this mountain!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 Raging Firestorms within the Inferno.
QuestData.CompletionText: You're covered in soot. Are we winning the fight out there?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. You've given us the opportunity to try to reclaim the upper hand.
